name: Oaken staff (2h)
data: It has little weapon class for its type (pathetic in general).
It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of shielding'.
It affects the skill mastery of shielding.
